'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

At a glance, you take this man to be one of the Huana. His face crumples as you approach, and he sags in his bindings, murmuring repeated oaths of gratitude.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           = * Free him from his captors and he'll ask you to rescue [Badema](/badema/).
}}
